channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CA

item.title: Report X-2024101272
item.description:
Report X-2024101272

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-25T09:22:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-03
  • City: TRACY
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: package was located on the load wall, the package was struck by another package causing it to ignite. most of the contents and packaging were ignited in the damage of the package causing a building evacuation. HAZ-SPILL line was called. The reference number for the report is 219696.
